column5: So my girl has decided for christmas to get me a gps I am looking for one 200 and under any suggestions the main thing I would like it for is navigation on the water for new lakes to avoid obstacles any suggestions?   Nelson
Garmin is one of the best brands.   dsn

For that price you could get the H20 LOWRANCE I-FINDER GPS....go to the website and check it out,and its waterproff too !!!!! very good unit,oh ya and its colored as well,good-luck     cheers    www.lowrance.com
